84 Hack Your Bureacracy 🏢

Apr 12, 2023

  • civictech
  • episode
  • bureaucracy hacking
  • government

We’re joined by Marina Nitze to talk about their book Hack Your Bureaucracy. We’ll discuss tactics you can use to get things done in all sorts of organizational environments.
